li.p: For Standalone agents → activate multiple agents more efficiently.
had been synced with S1, and then became Standalone. → can't activate and renew multi-agents at the same → S1 - download license file link → renew one by one (step 1 & 2)

ol.li:
On the Agent's console, Copy download link –→ get license file → import the file
Be sure to to copy the PSN on the License Management webpage?
Import license file & enter PSN for the first agent.

li.p: Find the license file and change the file name to lic.profile_tx.

note.p: Be sure to change the extension of the file name from .txt to .profile_tx.

li.p: Place the license file with the changed file name in the agent's Installer Package.
Open the StellarSetup.ini file in the Installer Package and input the PSN as the value of the product_serial_number property.

ol.li: Send the Installer Package to other devices for activation → refer to Case: Standalone's installer package with license data (license file & PSN)

li.p: Use the Installer Package to intall other standalone agents, the License File and the Product Serial Number will generate automatically in the License Activation procedure.

note.p: To renew license for standalone agents, users still need to renew one by one, or they'll need to uninstall and reinstall the repacked installer package.
